projects.name: Molly's Tasks
projects.description: Tasks assigned to Molly with approval workflow

tasks.title: Migrate Files to Supabase Database
tasks.description:
Convert our file-based system (documents, journal items, and other files) into database entries using Supabase.

**Milestones:**

**Phase 1: Setup & Schema**
- Set up Supabase project and API connection
- Design database schema for documents, journals, and metadata
- Create tables with proper indexes and relationships

**Phase 2: Migration Script**
- Build script to read existing markdown files
- Parse frontmatter and content
- Migrate all existing documents to database
- Verify data integrity

**Phase 3: API Integration**
- Create API routes for CRUD operations
- Update Molly to read from database instead of files
- Update Molly to write to database instead of files

**Phase 4: Cleanup**
- Remove dependency on file system for documents
- Archive old files
- Update documentation

tasks.title: Second Brain CRUD Interface
tasks.description:
Update Second Brain to allow creating, editing, and deleting items directly in the UI.

**Milestones:**

**Phase 1: Create Documents**
- Add 'New Document' button
- Build document creation form (title, content, tags)
- Markdown editor with preview
- Save to database/file system

**Phase 2: Edit Documents**
- Add 'Edit' button to document view
- Inline editing or modal editor
- Save changes with version tracking
- Auto-save drafts

**Phase 3: Delete Documents**
- Add 'Delete' button with confirmation
- Soft delete (trash) vs hard delete option
- Bulk operations (multi-select delete)

**Phase 4: Enhanced Features**
- Document search improvements
- Tag management UI (create, rename, merge tags)
- Document templates
- Import/export functionality

tasks.title: Add Phone Validation to Anchor & Staff Website
tasks.description:
Add free phone number validation to website forms.

**Research Findings:**

**Recommended: libphonenumber-js** ‚≠ê
- Lightweight: 145KB vs Google's 550KB
- TypeScript support built-in
- 8M+ weekly downloads
- Validates, formats, parses international numbers
- MIT License (FREE)

```bash
pnpm add libphonenumber-js
```

**Alternative: react-phone-number-input**
- Built on libphonenumber-js
- Ready-made React component with country selector
- Great UX with flag dropdown
- Also FREE (MIT License)

```bash
pnpm add react-phone-number-input
```

**Alternative: awesome-phonenumber**
- Smallest bundle (284KB total)
- Full Google libphonenumber port
- Also FREE

**Implementation Plan:**
1. Install libphonenumber-js (or react-phone-number-input for full component)
2. Create validation utility function
3. Add to form components
4. Display formatted number + validation errors

**No API costs - all validation runs client-side.**
